column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Thank you for your feedback.  While Jinya is a chain
column2: we do strive to give our customers the best possible products and service at my locations here in Houston.  Of course
column3: we are human so there will be some deficiencies on occasion
column4: but pls know that you are always welcome to send back anything that isn't to your liking.  We will be glad to remake or change it to better accommodate your taste preferences.  Thank you for letting us know of your experience and should you return
column5: pls ask for my managers Keith
column8: Long or Jenny.  Let them know of your experience from your last visit and we will do our best to ensure that your next visit meets your expectations.  Pls feel free to contact me directly as well at 640-906-6308.
